work.summary: Manages the overall Quality and Testing approach of the Company Projects and implements Process Impovements.

projects.name: Zukii
projects.description: Zukii is the very first m-commerce app that provides a whole new mobile shopping experience that connects customers to top-notch and favorite brands.

work.summary: Leads the entire team as a QA project lead and as a scrum master.

projects.name: ERX
projects.description: ERX is a hospital information system and clinical application that is based and customized to the client’s needs.

work.summary: Performs agile software testing and acts as a project trainor and project presentor for the clients.

projects.name: Medcurial
projects.description: Medcurial is a web-based electronic management records and practice management system for hospitals and clinics.

projects.name: MedCheck
projects.description: MedCheck is an online practice management software that provides doctors with appointment scheduler and electronic management record services and other healthcare management services.

work.summary: Conducted on-site stress and performance testing.

projects.name: Clarity
projects.description: Clarity provides integrated solutions for process automation and management, including operational support systems and network performance management.

projects.name: PPGIS
projects.description: PPGIS (Power of PLDT Geographic Information System) is a web-based application that enables the user to locate provinces, municipalities and barangays using Geographic Information system.

work.summary: Translated high-level business reqirements and troubleshooted errors from all testing environments.

projects.name: Workbrain
projects.description: Workbrain is a fully integrated total workforce management platform designed for companies with large, complex workforces. Designed to interface with all major payroll, HR, ERP, and other software vendors, the product integrates seamlessly into an organization’s complex systems environment.

certification.title: ISTQB-FL - International Software Testing Qualifications Board - Foundation Level
